book.title: Blue Jackets
book.description: 简介： The most cruel and ignominious punishment man can inflict upon his fellow men, is still enforced in the English Naval Service; though many indignantly deny it, and stigmatize this story as a libel on the British Navy. Unfortunately for Blue Jackets t...
